title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed with any model served by the local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node and browsers via the Ollama REST API.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain community integration to use Ollama models as LLMs, chat, or embeddings inside LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, admin, model management) built with SvelteKit; drop-in Docker container.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI that wraps the Ollama REST API with syntax highlighting and prompt history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental GitHub Copilot-like VS-Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline suggestions.

title: ollama-guardrails
summary: Lightweight guardrails wrapper around Ollama chat to filter unsafe prompts/responses using regex & small models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack NLP pipelines.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama with Kotlin extensions; chat, generate, pull, and delete models from Java apps.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local Ollama models into any server with slash commands and threads.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: RAG, function-calling, fine-tune prep, multi-modal demos using Ollama models.

title: ollama-c#
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with async/await, streaming, and dependency-injection helpers for ASP.NET Core.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama REST API; includes Rails generators for quick chat scaffolding.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger (CUE) module to spin up Ollama containers in CI pipelines for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot
summary: Minimal RAG chatbot using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB; shows retrieval and generation in ~100 lines.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLMs via Ollama for note summarization, Q&A, and writing assistance.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake packaging Ollama binaries and a module for declarative NixOS deployment with GPU drivers.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate for Ollama with tokio, strongly-typed requests/responses, and examples for Axum integration.
